languages.text: {n}Ничего не ответив, Арлекин растворяется в синей ряби. Последней исчезает рогатая маска, из-за которой раздаются несколько недобрых смешков.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ничего не ответив, Арлекин растворяется в синей ряби. Последней исчезает рогатая маска, из-за которой раздаются несколько недобрых смешков.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}Saying nothing, the Harlequin vanishes in a blue shimmer of air. The horned mask disappears last, with vicious laughter drifting out from beneath it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ничего не ответив, Арлекин растворяется в синей ряби. Последней исчезает рогатая маска, из-за которой раздаются несколько недобрых смешков.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Saying nothing, the Harlequin vanishes in a blue shimmer of air. The horned mask disappears last, with vicious laughter drifting out from beneath it.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}在一片蓝色的微光中，丑角一言不发地消失了。最后消失的是他带着角的面具，面具下发出了恶毒的大笑声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Saying nothing, the Harlequin vanishes in a blue shimmer of air. The horned mask disappears last, with vicious laughter drifting out from beneath it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在一片蓝色的微光中，丑角一言不发地消失了。最后消失的是他带着角的面具，面具下发出了恶毒的大笑声。{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}Sin decir palabra, el Arlequín se desvanece en una neblina azulada. La máscara cornuda es lo último en desaparecer, seguida de una risa salvaje.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Saying nothing, the Harlequin vanishes in a blue shimmer of air. The horned mask disappears last, with vicious laughter drifting out from beneath it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin decir palabra, el Arlequín se desvanece en una neblina azulada. La máscara cornuda es lo último en desaparecer, seguida de una risa salvaje.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンは何も言わず、青いきらめきとともに姿を消した。角の生えた仮面が最後に消えて、その下から凶悪な笑いが聞こえてきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Saying nothing, the Harlequin vanishes in a blue shimmer of air. The horned mask disappears last, with vicious laughter drifting out from beneath it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンは何も言わず、青いきらめきとともに姿を消した。角の生えた仮面が最後に消えて、その下から凶悪な笑いが聞こえてきた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin verschwindet wortlos in einem blauen Dunst. Die gehörnte Maske verschwindet zuletzt. Bösartiges Lachen dringt daraus hervor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Saying nothing, the Harlequin vanishes in a blue shimmer of air. The horned mask disappears last, with vicious laughter drifting out from beneath it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin verschwindet wortlos in einem blauen Dunst. Die gehörnte Maske verschwindet zuletzt. Bösartiges Lachen dringt daraus hervor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}Sans un mot, l'Arlequin s'évapore dans un nuage bleu scintillant. Son masque à cornes disparaît en dernier, emportant avec lui un rire cruel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Saying nothing, the Harlequin vanishes in a blue shimmer of air. The horned mask disappears last, with vicious laughter drifting out from beneath it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans un mot, l'arlequin s'évapore dans un nuage bleu scintillant. Son masque à cornes disparaît en dernier, emportant avec lui un rire cruel.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text: {n}Tek bir kelime bile etmeyen Arleken, mavi parıltılar içinde sırra kadem basıyor. Gözden en son kaybolan, boynuzlu maskesi oluyor. Maskenin altından zalim kahkahalar duyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Saying nothing, the Harlequin vanishes in a blue shimmer of air. The horned mask disappears last, with vicious laughter drifting out from beneath it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tek bir kelime bile etmeyen Arleken, mavi parıltılar içinde sırra kadem basıyor. Gözden en son kaybolan, boynuzlu maskesi oluyor. Maskenin altından zalim kahkahalar duyuluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle
